questions.name: qvt1
questions.title: If you strongly favor an option in a Quadratic Voting survey, you can cast more than one upvote for the option.

questions.name: qvt2
questions.title: In a Quadratic Voting survey, you can cast as many votes on an option as you like even if you have exceeded the maximum voice credits.

questions.name: qvt3
questions.title: In a Quadratic Voting survey, each vote costs one voice credit.

questions.name: qvt4
questions.title: In a Quadratic Voting survey, you must use up all the voice credits available in the given budget.

questions.name: qvt5
questions.title: What is the first attention code in the video?

questions.name: qvt6
questions.title: What is the second attention code in the video?
